  • Help

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
The main container of the app, containing and managing all "storage"-segments.
Calendar
The Calendar is a structure used for storage of data (in the form of Entries), sorted by date.
CalendarEntry
An Entry to the calendar.
CalendarEntryView
A view component representing an editor for a CalendarEntry.
CalendarSegment
A container class used for storage of CalendarEntries, representing the calendar-segment of the application.
CalendarSegmentView
A view component representing the CalendarSegment of the application.
CollectionSegmentView
A view component representing the CollectionSegment of the application.
CollectionView
A view component representing an editor for a NoteCollection.
Controller
The Controller creates and provides the data stored in the Application.
CustomContextMenu
A custom ContextMenu for EntryButtons saving the Button it was assigned to.
DateComparator
A comparator class comparing 2 dates using date.compareTo().
Day
A structure used for the storage of data (in the form of Entries) representing a certain day.
DayInMonthView
A view component for a single day in the MonthView of a calendar.
DayInWeekView
A view component for a single day in a WeekView of a calendar.
Entry
Serves as a superclass for all types of entries.
EntryButton
A custom Button for Entries.
MainApplication
The main class containing all components of the application.
Mode
The values of Mode represent the different modes of the application.
Month
A structure used for the storage of data (in the form of Entries) representing a certain month.
MonthView
A view-component for a month.
Note
A Note of information, bound to a specific date on a calendar.
NoteCollection
A NoteCollection is a collection of Note objects based on their title or their subject.
NoteSegment
A container class used for storage of Notes, representing the note-segment of the application.
NoteSegmentView
A view component representing the NoteSegment of the application.
NoteView
A view component representing an editor for a Note.
Segment
A superclass for the various segments of the application.
SegmentView
A superclass to all SegmentViews.
Subject
The values of subject each represent a school subject used for collection of notes.
SwitchButton
A button switching between 2 states.
TodoEntry
An Entry to a todolist.
TodoSegment
A container class used for storage of TodoEntries, representing the todo_-segment of the application.
TodoSegmentView
A view component representing the TodoSegmentView of the application.
WeekView
A view-component for a week.
